channel.title: Tatjana Kecojevic on R Bootcamp
channel.description: Recent content in Tatjana Kecojevic on R Bootcamp

item.title: Basic Stats Concepts
item.description: In this section you will be introduced to a set of concepts that enable data to be explored with the objective of summarising and understanding the main features of the variables contained within the data and to investigate the nature of any linkages between the variables that may exist. The starting point is to understand what data is. What is the population? Why do we use samples?
